attributes.action: stop spending £40 million pounds a day on the war in iraq and put the money towards the NHS, Lowering taxes, Creating affordable housing accross britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Think
every 24 hours, £40 million pounds of YOUR money is paying for the war in Iraq, which most people in britain disagree with,
you dont go out and buy something you dont like, so lets stop the government from allowing YOUR money to pay for something you dont agree with.
lets face it, the NHS is in major crisis, taxes are sky high and there is no affordable housing in britain due to the high prices and rates.
stop your government from spending your money abroad on a country that isn't our problem, and lets start spending it on Britain, where the money is supposed to be going to in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
